stringTranslations.error_crafting_no_sufficient_tool_owned: &cYou do not possess a tool sufficient to craft this item
stringTranslations.error_command_no_permission: &cYou do not have permission to use this command
stringTranslations.error_command_recipe_exists: &cA recipe with this name already exists.
stringTranslations.error_command_modifier_failed: &cThis item &7(%item%)&c is incompatible with this modifier &7(executed on %player%)
stringTranslations.error_command_vanilla_effects_illegal: &cVanilla effects cannot be applied with this command
stringTranslations.error_command_global_buff_expired: &cThis effect either does not exist or has already expired
stringTranslations.error_command_givebook: &cTutorial book not properly configured, check tutorial_book.yml
stringTranslations.error_command_resourcepack: &cSomething went wrong in fetching the resource pack
stringTranslations.error_command_advanced_modifier_unusable: &cAdvanced item modifiers are unusable in command format. Sorry!
stringTranslations.status_command_global_buff_warning: &aGlobal effect named %effect% applied, but it may not do anything because it was not registered!
stringTranslations.status_onetime_crafting_recipe_selected: &7Crafting recipe &a%recipe%&7 selected. Hold right click on the block to craft!
stringTranslations.status_onetime_tinkering_recipe_selected: &7Tinkering method &a%recipe%&7 selected. Hold right click on the block with &a%item% &7to tinker!
stringTranslations.status_command_resourcepack_downloaded: &aResource pack successfully downloaded! File location plugins/ValhallaMMO/ValhallaMMO.zip
stringTranslations.status_command_resourcepack_setup: &aResource pack successfully downloaded and installed! Restart the server to reflect the changes
stringTranslations.status_command_revealrecipes_enabled: &aThe names of crafted recipes are now shown to you
stringTranslations.status_command_revealrecipes_disabled: &cThe names of crafted recipes are now hidden from you
stringTranslations.status_command_party_created_by_admin: &aA party named &2%party% &ahas been created in your name
stringTranslations.status_command_party_target_higher_rank: &cYou can't do this to a member of higher rank
stringTranslations.status_command_party_rank_higher_sender: &cYou can't do this with ranks higher or equal to your own
stringTranslations.status_command_party_sender_not_leader: &cYou must be leader of the party to do this
stringTranslations.status_command_party_not_in_same_party: &cYou're not in the same party as this player
stringTranslations.status_command_party_party_not_found: &cParty could not be found or has been deleted
stringTranslations.status_command_party_feature_not_unlocke: &cYour party either doesn't have this feature unlocked or has it disabled
stringTranslations.status_command_party_cannot_kick_leader: &cThe leader cannot leave the party before transferring ownership
stringTranslations.status_command_party_no_item_held: &cYou need to be holding an item for Item Share
stringTranslations.status_command_party_character_limit_rea: &cCharacter limit exceeded, think of a shorter name/description
stringTranslations.status_command_party_invalid_characters_: &cIllegal characters used, valid characters are: 0-9, a-z, A-Z, &
stringTranslations.status_command_party_closed: &7Party is now closed to free joining
stringTranslations.status_command_party_invite_received: &a%party% invited you to join! Type &2/party join %party% &ato join
stringTranslations.warning_command_reload: &cWarning! Changes made to recipes and loot tables will be saved before the reload and will cause a lag spike. Type &4/val reload confirm&c to really reload
stringTranslations.warning_profile_reset: &cHold on! This type of reset cannot be undone and will completely reset (part of) the player's progress. Execute this command again to reset, otherwise let the request expire in 10 seconds.
stringTranslations.warning_command_import: &cHold on! Importing recipes may cause a lag spike, execute this command again within 10 seconds to proceed anyway.
stringTranslations.description_command_help: Shows a list of all your available commands
stringTranslations.description_command_profile: View detailed stats about a player's skill
stringTranslations.description_command_exp: Gives you or a player an amount of skill experience
stringTranslations.description_command_modify: Modifies a held item given a modifier and strength
stringTranslations.description_command_attribute: Applies an attribute to a held item
stringTranslations.description_command_effect: Gives any player any custom potion effect
stringTranslations.description_command_potionattribute: Applies a custom potion effect to the held item
stringTranslations.description_command_reward: Executes a Perk Reward onto a player with the given argument
stringTranslations.description_command_loot: Accesses ValhallaMMO's custom loot table manager
stringTranslations.description_command_globalbuff: Add or cancel global effects like increased EXP gain for everyone
stringTranslations.description_command_reload: Reloads all the configs into memory, &cthis saves changes made to recipes and loot tables which may cause a lag spike
stringTranslations.description_command_givebook: Gives you or other players the "getting started" book for ValhallaMMO
stringTranslations.description_command_import: Imports all recipes from a file present in the recipes folder, can override or skip existing recipes.
stringTranslations.description_command_resourcepack: Use &edownload &7 to download a copy of the ValhallaMMO resource pack or use &esetup &7to both download and install the pack onto the server. This overrides any resource pack changes in server.properties
stringTranslations.description_command_itemindex: Save an item under an ID so it may later be used in recipe modifiers
stringTranslations.description_command_hidebossbars: Toggles the visibility of boss bars to indicate experience gain for a player
stringTranslations.description_command_revealrecipes: Allows you to view the exact names of the vanilla recipes you're crafting, allowing you to disable them in config.yml
stringTranslations.modifier_warning_counter_exceeded_player: &cYou currently can't apply more upgrade slots
stringTranslations.skill-account-description: &8Level other skills to get exp for your player level. Level up to get skill points to spend on other skills
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-description: &8Practice Smithing to make tools and equipment of increasingly superior quality
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-perk-main-1-description: &7You are able to craft items of &eTier I&7 materials of much higher quality.
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-perk-main-2-description: &7You are able to craft items of &eTier II&7 materials of much higher quality.
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-perk-main-3-description: &7You are able to craft items of &eTier III&7 materials of much higher quality
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-perk-prismarine-descripti: &7Unlocks the Trident recipe for you, and you can craft them with increased quality.
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-perk-main-4-description: &7You are able to craft items of &eTier IV&7 materials of much higher quality
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-perk-ender-description: &7Unlocks the Elytra recipe for you, and you can craft them with increased quality.
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-perk-main-5-description: &7You are able to craft items of &eTier V&7 materials of much higher quality
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-perk-final-description: &7You pour your heart and soul into your next creation, gaining +50 to crafting quality. You will not be able to repeat this feat.
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-perk-special-description: &7Having truly mastered your craft, all your creations benefit from &e+50&7 crafting quality.
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-perk-specialisation-bow-1: &7You specialize in crafting bows/crossbows. Bows you craft gain &e+20&7 to their quality. Better quality bows shoot arrows with greater velocity and gain better durability.
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-perk-specialisation-bow-2: &7You specialize in crafting bows/crossbows. Bows you craft gain &e+40&7 to their quality. Better quality bows shoot arrows with greater velocity and gain better durability.
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-perk-specialisation-bow-3: &7You specialize in crafting bows/crossbows. Bows you craft gain &e+60&7 to their quality. Better quality bows shoot arrows with greater velocity and gain better durability.
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-perk-specialisation-bow-4: &7You specialize in crafting bows/crossbows. Bows you craft gain &e+80&7 to their quality. Better quality bows shoot arrows with greater velocity and gain better durability.
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-perk-specialisation-bow-5: &7You master crafting bows/crossbows. Bows you craft gain &e+100&7 to their quality.
stringTranslations.skill-mining-description: &8Practice Mining to increase your ore extraction, increase the effectiveness of blast mining, and to gain rare minerals useful in crafting
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-ranked-1-description: &7You'll occasionally start finding rare minerals while mining rock, ores like coal grant more enchanting experience.
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-ranked-2-description: &7Rare minerals become more common, and you start gaining a little bit of enchanting experience while mining rock.
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-ranked-3-description: &7Rare minerals become even more common, and you gain an extra &e20% &7chance to get 2x resources
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-ranked-4-description: &7Rare minerals become even more common, as well as the experience gained from mining rock and ores
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-ranked-5-description: &7Rare minerals become much more common, you gain a &e+30% &7chance to get double drops, and you get much more enchanting experience from mining rock.
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-main-1-description: &7Mining &eores &7while sneaking rapidly mines all connected ores up to 64 blocks and puts them in your inventory.
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-main-2-description: &7You can mine a couple more blocks with &cOverdrive &7before losing hunger or health. Also, you don't need to rest as long after using the ability
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-main-3-description: &7You can mine even more blocks with &cOverdrive &7before losing hunger or health. Also, you need even less time to rest after using the ability
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-main-4-description: &7Vein Miner now additionally works on &eAndesite&7, &eGranite&7, &eDiorite&7, &eCalcite&7, and &eBlackstone&7. but not Stone, Deepslate, Obsidian, Netherrack, or End Stone
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-blast-mining-a-descrip: &7TNT is &e50%&7 more powerful, and you also take &e50%&7 less explosion damage from TNT
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-blast-mining-b-descrip: &7You unlock a recipe that allows you to craft 3 tnt for just 1 extra gunpowder
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-blast-mining-c-descrip: &7You gain &e20% &7more drops from TNT-exploded blocks, as well as more rare drops
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-blast-mining-d-descrip: &7You gain &e30% &7more drops from TNT-exploded blocks, as well as much more rare drops
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-blast-mining-e-descrip: &7TNT is &etwice&7 as powerful, and you are completely immune to explosion damage from TNT. You may also choose to enhance your TNT with either Fortune or Silk Touch without spending skill points
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-blast-mining-e-silk-de: &7Blocks destroyed by TNT will drop as if they were broken with a &9Silk Touch &7enchantment. Overrides &eFortune &7if previously chosen
stringTranslations.skill-mining-perk-blast-mining-e-fortune: &7Blocks destroyed by TNT will drop as if they were broken with a &eFortune III &7enchantment. Overrides &9Silk Touch &7if previously chosen
stringTranslations.skill-light-weapons-description: &8Light Weapons aren't very effective against heavy plate armor, but attack much faster and are able to deflect attacks better
stringTranslations.skill-light-weapons-perk-ranked-1-descri: &7You gain a &e10%&7 chance to inflict a critical hit and attack a little bit faster
stringTranslations.skill-light-weapons-perk-ranked-2-descri: &7Critical strikes inflict &eBleeding&7, which deals 1 heart of damage every 2 seconds, 3 times. Bleeding damage ignores armor
stringTranslations.skill-light-weapons-perk-ranked-3-descri: &7Unlocks &eParry&7, which allows you to deflect enemy attacks and stun them when you do.
stringTranslations.skill-light-weapons-perk-ranked-4-descri: &7Bleeding inflicted by you lasts 2 ticks longer. Additionally, your chance to critically strike increases by &e10%.
stringTranslations.skill-light-weapons-perk-ranked-5-descri: &7Parrying becomes much easier, cancels &eall &7damage, and can be done every &e6&7 seconds.
stringTranslations.skill-light-weapons-perk-weapons-1-descr: &7Unlocks &eDaggers&7 for crafting at the anvil. Daggers benefit from high attack speed and crit chance, but lower reach and no knockback
stringTranslations.skill-light-weapons-perk-weapons-2-descr: &7Unlocks &eMaces&7 for crafting at the anvil. Maces benefit from increased knockback and stun chance, but reduced crit chance and slower attack speed
stringTranslations.skill-light-weapons-perk-main-1-descript: &7Your melee attacks become a &e10%&7 faster, and the enemy is immune for a shorter duration after being struck
stringTranslations.skill-light-weapons-perk-main-2-descript: &7You gain the ability to coat weapons with a negative potion effect, applying it on the next 3 hits at half strength and a quarter of the duration
stringTranslations.skill-light-weapons-perk-main-3-descript: &7Enemy light armor is &e5&7 points less effective by your attacks, and your critical hits do &e20% &7more damage
stringTranslations.skill-light-weapons-perk-main-4-descript: &7Your melee attacks become a &e10%&7 faster, and the enemy is immune for a shorter duration after being struck, and you deal a little bit more knockback
stringTranslations.skill-light-weapons-perk-main-5-descript: &7Your weapon coatings now last for &e10 &7hits and effects last &etwice &7as long
stringTranslations.skill-light-armor-description: &8Practice Light Armor to improve your evasion and stay protected without sacrificing much mobility.
stringTranslations.skill-light-armor-perk-ranked-1-descript: &7When you hit 20% health or lower while wearing full light armor &eAdrenaline &7activates, giving you &eSpeed &7and &eJump Boost&7. Has a &e20 minute cooldown
stringTranslations.skill-light-armor-perk-ranked-2-descript: &7Adrenaline becomes more effective, gaining &eRegeneration&7, and its cooldown is reduced to &e16 minutes
stringTranslations.skill-light-armor-perk-ranked-3-descript: &7Adrenaline becomes more effective, providing &eSpeed II &7and &eJump Boost II&7, and its cooldown is reduced to &e12 minutes
stringTranslations.skill-light-armor-perk-ranked-4-descript: &7Adrenaline becomes more effective, providing &eRegeneration II&7, and its cooldown is reduced to &e8 minutes
stringTranslations.skill-light-armor-perk-ranked-5-descript: &7Adrenaline becomes more effective, providing &eSpeed III &7and &eJump Boost III&7, its cooldown is reduced to &e4 minutes, and it now triggers at &e30% health &7instead of 20%
stringTranslations.skill-light-armor-perk-set-1-description: &7While wearing a full set of light armor, you lose hunger &e20% &7slower
stringTranslations.skill-light-armor-perk-set-2-description: &7While wearing a full set of light armor, you gain a &e10% chance &7to dodge attacks (must be able to see attacker for this)
stringTranslations.skill-light-armor-perk-set-3-description: &7You now only need to wear &e3 pieces &7of light armor to benefit from &e'set bonus' &7perks
stringTranslations.skill-light-armor-perk-set-4-description: &7Light armor weighs significantly less and doesn't slow you down as much when worn
stringTranslations.skill-light-armor-perk-set-5-description: &7Light armor becomes &e20% &7more protective while wearing a full set
stringTranslations.skill-light-armor-perk-set-6-description: &7Light armor weighs nothing, and no longer slows you down when worn
stringTranslations.skill-light-armor-perk-immunity-1-descri: &7You become completely immune against &ePoison &7and &eWithering &7while wearing a full set of light armor
stringTranslations.skill-light-armor-perk-immunity-2-descri: &7You gain significant resistance against &eMagic Damage&7 for each piece of light armor you wear. Additionally, you gain immunity against &eMining Fatigue &7while wearing a full set of light armor
stringTranslations.skill-landscaping-description: &8Practice Landscaping to increase your wood harvesting, to find rare drops in the dirt, and to augment your building skills
stringTranslations.skill-landscaping-perk-digging-ranked-1-: &7You start getting some rare resources from the ground, and you gain a little bit of enchanting experience from it.
stringTranslations.skill-landscaping-perk-digging-ranked-2-: &7You get rare resources from the ground more frequently, and you gain more enchanting experience from it.
stringTranslations.skill-landscaping-perk-digging-ranked-3-: &7You get rare resources from the ground a lot more frequently, and you gain more enchanting experience from it.
stringTranslations.skill-landscaping-perk-woodcutting-ranke: &7You start getting some rare resources from logs, and you gain a little bit of enchanting experience from them.
&7You get rare resources from logs more frequently, and you gain more enchanting experience from them.
&7You get rare resources from logs a lot more frequently, and you gain more enchanting experience from them.
stringTranslations.skill-landscaping-perk-woodcutting-main-: &7Cutting oak trees while sneaking now destroys the entire tree. Planted saplings grow slightly faster
&7Tree Feller now also fells birch trees and acacia trees. Planted saplings grow even faster
&7Tree Feller now also fells dark oak trees and has its cooldown reduced to 5 seconds. Planted saplings grow even faster
&7Saplings are automatically replanted after cutting down a tree, and Tree Feller now also works on spruce and jungle trees.
&7Tree Feller now also fells warped and crimson large fungi and has its cooldown removed. Planted saplings grow even faster
stringTranslations.skill-landscaping-perk-digging-main-1-de: &7Grants you the ability to convert blocks like cobblestone, stone, dirt, and stone bricks to their mossy/overgrown variants.
stringTranslations.skill-landscaping-perk-digging-main-2-de: &7Grants you the ability to damage blocks like stone, stone bricks, cobblestone, and others to their damaged variants (stone bricks -> cracked stone bricks).
stringTranslations.skill-landscaping-perk-digging-main-3-de: &7Grants you the ability to melt blocks like glass or clay into sand and terracotta
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-weapons-description: &8Heavy Weapons aren't very effective at blocking incoming attacks, but hit much harder and are more effective against armor
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-weapons-perk-ranked-1-descri: &7You gain a &e10%&7 chance to inflict a critical hit and your knockback is increased
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-weapons-perk-ranked-2-descri: &7Critical strikes inflict &eBleeding&7, which deals 1 heart of damage every 2 seconds, 3 times. Bleeding damage ignores armor
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-weapons-perk-ranked-3-descri: &7Unlocks &eCrushing Blow&7, a powerful attack activating when you attack while falling which does &e50% &7of the damage to all enemies in a &e1.5 &7block radius
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-weapons-perk-ranked-4-descri: &7Bleeding inflicted by you lasts 2 ticks longer. Additionally, your chance to critically strike increases by &e10%.
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-weapons-perk-ranked-5-descri: &7Crushing Blow now does &e100% &7of the initial damage, and its attack affects a bigger radius.
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-weapons-perk-weapons-1-descr: &7Unlocks &eWarhammers&7 for crafting at the anvil. Warhammers benefit from added stun chance and ignore some armor(blunt force), but lower damage and reduced crit chance
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-weapons-perk-weapons-2-descr: &7Unlocks &eSpears&7 for crafting at the anvil. Spears benefit from added attack reach, ignore some armor and gain damage based on your speed, but have far slower attack speed
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-weapons-perk-main-1-descript: &7Your melee attacks do &e10% &7more damage, and enemy light armor is &e10% &7less effective
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-weapons-perk-main-2-descript: &7You gain the ability to coat weapons with a negative potion effect, applying it on the next 2 hits at a tenth of the duration
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-weapons-perk-main-3-descript: &7Enemy armor is &e10%&7 less effective by your attacks, and your critical hits do &e20% &7more damage
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-weapons-perk-main-4-descript: &7Your melee attacks do &e10%&7 more damage, gain &e10% &7stun chance, and any armor the enemy is wearing is &e10% &7less effective
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-weapons-perk-main-5-descript: &7Your weapon coatings now last for &e5 &7hits and effects last &etwice &7as long
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-armor-description: &8Practice Heavy Armor to greatly reduce damage taken, and become an undefeatable menace
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-armor-perk-ranked-1-descript: &7When you hit 20% health or lower while wearing full heavy armor &eRage &7activates, giving you &eStrength &7and &eHaste&7. Has a &e20 minute cooldown
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-armor-perk-ranked-2-descript: &7Rage becomes more effective, gaining &eAbsorption&7, and its cooldown is reduced to &e16 minutes
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-armor-perk-ranked-3-descript: &7Rage becomes more effective, providing &eStrength II &7and &eHaste II&7, and its cooldown is reduced to &e12 minutes
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-armor-perk-ranked-4-descript: &7Rage becomes more effective, providing &eAbsorption II&7, and its cooldown is reduced to &e8 minutes
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-armor-perk-ranked-5-descript: &7Rage becomes more effective, providing &eStrength III &7and &eHaste III&7, its cooldown is reduced to &e4 minutes, and it now triggers at &e30% health &7instead of 20%
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-armor-perk-perk-set-1-descri: &7While wearing a full set of heavy armor, your healing is amplified by 10%
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-armor-perk-perk-set-2-descri: &7While wearing a full set of heavy armor, you gain a &e10% chance &7to reflect &e30% &7of damage taken
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-armor-perk-perk-set-3-descri: &7You now only need to wear &e3 pieces &7of heavy armor to benefit from &e'set bonus' &7perks
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-armor-perk-perk-set-4-descri: &7Heavy armor weighs significantly less and doesn't slow you down as much when worn
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-armor-perk-perk-set-5-descri: &7Heavy armor becomes &e20% &7more protective while wearing a full set
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-armor-perk-perk-set-6-descri: &7Heavy armor slows you down even less while worn
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-armor-perk-perk-immunity-1-d: &7You become completely immune against &eSlowness &7and &eWeakness &7while wearing a full set of heavy armor
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-armor-perk-perk-immunity-2-d: &7You gain significant resistance against &eFire and Magic Damage&7 for each piece of heavy armor you wear. Additionally, you gain immunity against &eNausea &7and &eBlindness &7while wearing a full set of heavy armor
stringTranslations.skill-farming-description: &8Practice Farming to increase your harvest's bounty, to collect rare plants and ingredients, and to improve your fishing and livestock farming.
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-main-1-description: &7You start gaining a little bit of enchanting experience while farming crops.
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-main-2-description: &7Planted crops gain a &e25% &7chance to immediately grow a stage, and grown food feeds you more
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-main-3-description: &7You gain a small chance to receive rare drops from harvested crops. These drops can be used for things like alchemy and crafting. You also gain slightly more experience for harvested crops.
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-main-4-description: &7Right-clicking on a crop will now instantly harvest and replant it, and planted crops will now have a &e75% &7chance to immediately grow a stage. Grown food feeds you even more
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-main-5-description: &7Your chance to gain rare drops from crops is &etripled&7. You gain more enchanting experience from crops, and planted crops will now &ealways&7 grow &e1&7 stage with a &e25%&7 chance to grow a second one.
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-main-6a-description: &7Every 5 seconds by shift-right-clicking a crop you are able to harvest up to 128 crops around the initial crop effortlessly
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-main-6b-description: &7Planted crops now have a &e75% &7chance to grow a &esecond&7 stage, you gain more enchanting experience for harvesting crops, and you gain a &e50% &7chance to drop &e3x&7 items instead of &e2x
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-animals-1-description: &7You gain &e30% &7more enchanting experience from breeding animals. Animals grow up slightly faster and meat feeds you more
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-animals-2-description: &7You gain &e50% &7more drops from livestock. You do &e100% &7more damage against animals.
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-animals-3-description: &7You gain &e2x&7 the enchanting experience from breeding animals, and baby animals grow up much faster. Meat feeds you even more
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-animals-4-description: &7You gain complete immunity to all negative effects if they come from food, and garbage foods feed you 3x more
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-bees-description: &7Hives gain a &e50% &7chance to not be "emptied" when harvesting honey or honeycomb from them. Bees will also not be aggressive towards you.
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-fishing-1-description: &7You gain &e30% &7more enchanting experience from fishing, you catch fish slightly faster, and fish feeds you more
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-fishing-2-description: &7Your catches improve in quality, and you catch fish slightly faster
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-fishing-3-description: &7Your catches improve in quality greatly, you catch fish slightly faster, and fish feeds you even more
stringTranslations.skill-farming-perk-fishing-4-description: &7Your catches improve in quality, you now catch fish twice as fast
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-description: &8Practice Enchanting to grant your equipment enchantments of epic strength
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-perk-main-1-description: &7Your enchanting is &e20&7 points more potent. Unlocks &fFortify Woodcutting &7and &eFortify Farming &7upgrades (leggings)
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-perk-main-2-description: &7Your enchanting is &e20&7 points more potent. Unlocks &fFortify Digging &7and &eFortify Mining &7upgrades (chestplates)
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-perk-main-3-description: &7Your enchanting is &e20&7 points more potent. Unlocks &eFortify Alchemy (helmets) &7and &eFortify Smithing (chestplates) &7upgrades
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-perk-main-4-description: &7Your enchanting is &e20&7 points more potent. Unlocks &eBleeding (axes)&7, &eFortify Archery (helmets)&7, and &eImmunity (boots) &7upgrades
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-perk-main-5-description: &7Your enchanting is &e20&7 points more potent. Unlocks &eReach (weapons)&7, &eCurse (light weapons)&7, and &eArmor (..armor) &7upgrades
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-perk-vanilla-1-descript: &7You gain &e33% &7more (vanilla) experience from all sources. Increases your enchanting power by &e+40
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-perk-vanilla-2-descript: &7You gain a &e25%&7 chance to be refunded &e50% &7of your experience when enchanting. You unlock the &eExperience &7upgrade (armor).
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-perk-vanilla-3-descript: &7You gain &e+50%&7 more (vanilla) experience. Increases your enchanting power by &e+60
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-perk-custom-1-descripti: &7All skills level &e+5%&7 faster. Increases your upgrading power by &e+40
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-perk-custom-2-descripti: &7You gain &e25%&7 more special enchanting (skill) experience. You unlock enchantments of &eLearning.
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-perk-custom-3-descripti: &7All skills level &e+10%&7 faster. Increases your upgrading power by &e+60
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-perk-spellbinder-descri: &7Enchantment table enchantments now have a &e100% &7chance to be amplified(or reduced) rather than &e80%&7. Your experience refund chance increases to &e50%, and you have a &e33% &7chance to be refunded lapis lazuli on enchanting
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-perk-double-description: &7You are now able to apply &e2 &7upgrades on an item instead of &e1&7, and your ability to combine enchantments in the anvil greatly improves
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-perk-masterpiece-descri: &7Your next upgrade benefits from &e+50&7 extra power, this can only occur once.
stringTranslations.skill-archery-description: &8Practice Archery to increase your ranged damage, improve your accuracy, and kill targets consistently at a safe distance.
stringTranslations.skill-archery-perk-ranked-1-description: &7Your hand becomes significantly more stable, increasing your accuracy.
stringTranslations.skill-archery-perk-ranked-2-description: &7Your arrows hurt more the further they fly, and you gain a &e10% &7chance to not consume ammo when shooting
stringTranslations.skill-archery-perk-ranked-3-description: &7Your accuracy increases further and your arrows deal &e10% &7more damage overall
stringTranslations.skill-archery-perk-ranked-4-description: &7The damage penalty on arrows shot by Infinity enchanted bows is reduced by half, and you gain an extra &e20% &7chance to not consume arrows shot
stringTranslations.skill-archery-perk-ranked-5-description: &7Arrows hurt &e20% &7more and gain more damage the further away they're shot from
stringTranslations.skill-archery-perk-crit-1-description: &7Shooting an enemy looking away from you has a 100% chance to cause critical damage. Critical hits deal 30% more damage and stun the enemy briefly
stringTranslations.skill-archery-perk-crit-2-description: &7Critical hits now deal &e2x &7damage instead of +30%, and the stun duration is increased to &e1.5 seconds
stringTranslations.skill-archery-perk-special-1-description: &7You unlock &eCharged Shot&7. &eActivating it grants you 3 charges of Charged Shot, each flying 30% faster, improved knockback, and piercing 1 target. Has a 30 second cooldown
stringTranslations.skill-archery-perk-special-2-description: &7Charged Shot gains &e2 &7extra charges and each shot is fired at full velocity regardless of how long the bow was drawn back, its cooldown is reduced to &e20 seconds &7and can pierce 1 more target
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-description: &8Practice Alchemy to make potions and poisons of extreme potency, and learn how to transmute materials
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-perk-main-1-description: &7All your brewed potions gain an extra &e+20&7 points to their quality. Unlocks potions of &eLuck&7 and &eNight Vision&7
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-perk-main-2-description: &7All your brewed potions gain an extra &e+20&7 points to their quality. Unlocks potions of &eEfficient Brewing&7 and &eConduit Power
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-perk-main-3-description: &7All your brewed potions gain an extra &e+20&7 points to their quality. Unlocks potions of &eRapid Brewing&7 and &eHaste
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-perk-main-4-description: &7All your brewed potions gain an extra &e+20&7 points to their quality. Unlocks potion of &eWisdom
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-perk-main-5-description: &7All your brewed potions gain an extra &e+20&7 points to their quality and you brew potions &e+30%&7 faster. Unlocks potion of &eHealth Boost
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-perk-main-6-description: &7All your brewed potions gain an extra &e+50&7 points to their quality and you brew potions &e+40%&7 faster. Unlocks Potion of &eWar.
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-perk-debuff-1-description: &7All your brewed poisons gain an additional &e+20&7 points to their quality. Unlocks Potion of &eMining Fatigue &7and &eStrong Arm.
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-perk-debuff-2-description: &7You throw potions 50% further. Unlocks potions of &eWither &7and &eBlindness
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-perk-debuff-3-description: &7All your brewed poisons gain an additional &e+30&7 points to their quality. You gain a &e33% &7chance to not consume an ingredient during brewing and a &e20% &7chance to re-use potions on throwing or drinking. Lastly, unlocks all other poisons
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-perk-buff-1-description: &7All your brewed beneficial potions gain an additional &e+20&7 points to their quality. Unlocks Potion of &eRegeneration &7and &eInstant Health.
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-perk-buff-2-description: &7Your brewing stands brews &e+30%&7 faster. Unlocks potions of &eSaturation&7, &eStrength&7, &eFortify Armor&7, and &eFortify Healing
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-perk-buff-3-description: &7All your brewed beneficial potions gain an additional &e+30&7 points to their quality. Unlocks all fortification potions.
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-perk-transmutation-1-descr: &7Unlocks &eAlchemic Precursor &7that, when thrown on something, may transmute it to something else. Probably not good to drink though...
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-perk-transmutation-2-descr: &7Your &eAlchemic Precursor&7 can transform copper to iron, iron to gold, and emerald to diamond. Unlocks &ePotion of Ambrosia &7and the &eEnchanted Golden Apple &7recipe
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-alchemy-r1-descripti: &7Allows you to brew potions a little bit faster, at better quality. Unlocks potions of &eFortify Farming&7, &eFortify Woodcutting&7, and &eRapid Brewing
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-alchemy-r2-descripti: &7Improves the quality of your potions further, and grants you some chance to not spend brewing ingredients. Unlocks potions of &eFortify Mining&7, &eFortify Digging&7, &eStrong Arm&7, and &eEfficient Brewing
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-alchemy-r3-descripti: &7Improves the quality of your potions further, improves brewing speed, and unlocks potions of &eFortify Healing &7and &eHaste
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-alchemy-r4-descripti: &7Improves the quality of your potions further, improves ingredient efficiency, and unlocks potions of &eHealth Boost &7and &eLearning
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-alchemy-r5-descripti: &7Improves the quality of your potions further, improves brewing speed greatly, and unlocks potion of &eWar
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-alchemy-d1-descripti: &7Improves the quality of your poisonous potions, and you may throw potions &e50%&7 further. Unlocks potions of &eHunger&7, &eDecay&7, and &eFatigue&7
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-alchemy-d2-descripti: &7Improves the quality of your poisonous potions further, and you gain a &e33% &7chance to not consume potions when throwing or drinking. Unlocks potions of &eBlindness&7, &eVulnerability&7, and &eCurse
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-alchemy-b1-descripti: &7Improves the quality of your beneficial potions. Unlocks potions of &eSaturation&7, &eLuck&7, and &eConduit Power&7
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-alchemy-b2-descripti: &7Improves the quality of your beneficial potions further. Unlocks potions of &eFortify Archery &7, &eFortify Armor &7, &eFortify Enchanting&7, and &eFortify Smithing
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-alchemy-f-descriptio: &7Grants the ability to brew &eAlchemic Precursor&7, as well as &eAmbrosia&7 and to craft &eEnchanted Golden Apples&7. Improves potion quality one last time.
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-archery-r1-descripti: &7Improves shot accuracy, and grants you some critical strike chance. Critical strikes deal 30% more damage.
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-archery-r2-descripti: &7Your ranged damage dealt over large distances increases, and you gain some chance to not spend ammo during shooting.
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-archery-r3-descripti: &7Improves shot accuracy further, grants some critical strike chance, and improves minimum damage dealt.
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-archery-r4-descripti: &7Increases the damage dealt of arrows shot with the Infinity enchantment, and improves the chance to not spend ammo further.
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-archery-r5-descripti: &7Improves shot accuracy immensely, grants more critical strike chance, and improves damage dealt as well as more over large distances.
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-archery-c-descriptio: &7Critical hits stun the target, deal 20% more damage, and are guaranteed if the target is looking away.
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-archery-s-descriptio: &7Grants the Charged Shot ability, an ability that allows you to shoot a number of powered up shots at max speed regardless of pullback.
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-enchanting-r1-descri: &7Enhances your enchanting and anvil potency slightly
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-enchanting-r3-descri: &7Enhances your enchanting and anvil potency significantly
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-enchanting-r4-descri: &7Enhances your enchanting and anvil potency extremely
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-enchanting-r5-descri: &7Enhances your enchanting and anvil potency immensely, and unlock the ability to transfer enchantments from items to books
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-enchanting-ab1-descr: &7Protective enchantments become more potent at protecting from damage
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-enchanting-ab2-descr: &7Protective enchantments become even more potent at protecting from damage
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-enchanting-al1-descr: &7Environmental enchantments like Fortune, Looting, Efficiency, Luck of the Sea, Lure, Soul Speed, Swift Sneak, are more potent
stringTranslations.preset-simple-skill-enchanting-ev1-descr: &7Offensive enchantments like Sharpness, Smite, Power, Impaling, etc. become more potent at dealing damage
